content.content: And I still dont get notification emails when a vote goes live. Whats the reason for this? Do you not want governance to know theres a vote happening?
content.GPT-summary: The post is a question about why the user is not receiving notification emails when a vote goes live. The user also expresses suspicion that this may be intentional to prevent governance from being aware of the vote. The post does not relate to a proposal, but rather to a technical issue with the voting system.
GPT-discussion-categories: 3rd party giving negative feedback on proposal
